caption.center: Amending Criminal Rule 35 to add new subsection (h) concerning AS

opinion.opinion_text:
IT IS ORDERED:
Criminal Rule 35 is amended by adding a new subsection to read as follows:
Rule 35. Reduction, Correction, or Suspension of Sentence.
* * * *
(h) Notwithstanding the limitations in subsection (b) of this rule, the court may modify or reduce a sentence under AS 28.35.028.Page 2 /s/____________________________ Chief Justice Fabe
/s/____________________________ Justice Matthews
/s/____________________________ Justice Eastaugh
/s/____________________________ Justice Bryner
/s/____________________________ Justice Carpeneti
/s/____________________________ Justice WinfreePage 1
